summary: Website project featuring a Music page for the Synthetic Agondonters Collective (Suno/@nebacrypt) with track cards linking out to Suno, plus a front page preview teaser with a 'See all music' link.
architectural_notes: Music page uses manually curated track cards (no embed API) linking out to https://suno.com/@nebacrypt

existing_features.title: Create a standalone Music page (`/music` route) that showcases the Synthetic Agondonters Collective. The page should display a curated grid of track cards, each showing a track title, a short description or genre tag, and a link that opens the corresponding Suno track at https://suno.com/@nebacrypt in a new tab. The layout must be responsive for both mobile and desktop, and must match the existing site's Nordic-themed design (colors, typography, component patterns from index.css and Tailwind config).

Add a compact preview section for the Synthetic Agondonters Collective on the existing Landing page (`LandingPage.tsx`). This section should display 2â€“3 highlighted track cards (same card design as the full Music page) and include a prominent 'See all music' call-to-action link that navigates to the `/music` page. The section should be placed in a logical position on the landing page (e.g., after the services section) and must be fully responsive.

Register the new Music page in the application router (`App.tsx`) so that navigating to `/music` renders the Music page. Add a 'Music' navigation link to the site header (`Header.tsx`) for both desktop and mobile menus, pointing to the `/music` route.

new_feature_requests.summary: Standalone Music page showcasing the Synthetic Agondonters Collective with track cards linking to Suno (@nebacrypt), functional mobile/desktop UI matching existing site style
Front page preview section with a few highlighted track cards for the Synthetic Agondonters Collective and a 'See all music' link to the full Music page
